entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , London
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:11 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Drizzle, -3.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 2:00 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
Condition: Light Freezing Drizzle
Temperature: -3.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -4.2°C
Wind: ESE 21 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of drizzle or freezing drizzle. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle changing to periods of drizzle this afternoon. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle changing to a few flurries this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
